paragraphs.text:
import java.util.Properties
import org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext

val jdbcHostname = "columnstore"
val jdbcPort = 3306
val jdbcDatabase ="bookstore"
val jdbcUsername = "root"
val jdbcPassword =""
val driverClass = "org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver"
// Create the JDBC URL without passing in the user and password parameters.
val jdbcUrl = s"jdbc:mysql://${jdbcHostname}:${jdbcPort}/${jdbcDatabase}"

// Create a Properties() object to hold the parameters.
val connectionProperties = new Properties()
connectionProperties.put("user", s"${jdbcUsername}")
connectionProperties.put("password", s"${jdbcPassword}")
connectionProperties.setProperty("Driver", driverClass)
connectionProperties.setProperty("fetchSize","10000")
connectionProperties.setProperty("fetchSize","10000")
val sqlcontext = new org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext(sc)

val pushdown_query = "(select * from bookstore.books) b"

val df_books = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)
df_books.createOrReplaceTempView("books")
df_books.printSchema()

paragraphs.title: Price Distribution by Genre
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select  category, avg(cover_price) as `Cover Price(Avg)`, count(*) as Items from books where discount IN (${checkbox(,):Discount=0.00|0.03|0.07,0.00|0.03|0.07}) group by category order by `Cover Price(Avg)`

paragraphs.text:
%sql

paragraphs.text:
val pushdown_query="(select c.*, ms.ms_type FROM customers c INNER JOIN maritalstatuses ms on ms.ms_id=c.ms_id) as q"

val df_customers = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)
df_customers.createOrReplaceTempView("customers")
df_customers.printSchema()

paragraphs.text:
%sql

paragraphs.text:
df.createOrReplaceTempView("transactions")
val pushdown_query="(select c.*, ms.ms_type FROM customers c INNER JOIN maritalstatuses ms on ms.ms_id=c.ms_id) as q"
val df = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)
//df.show()

%spark
val pushdown_query = "(SELECT count(t.order_id) orders, SUM(t.price), SUM(t.discounted_price) Amount, t.customer_id,  c.customer_nm, c.sex, c.age, ms.ms_type FROM transactions as t INNER JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id INNER JOIN maritalstatuses ms ON ms.ms_id = c.ms_id GROUP BY  t.customer_id, c.customer_nm, c.sex, c.age, ms.ms_type ORDER BY orders desc) as t"
val df_orders = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)
df_orders.createOrReplaceTempView("transactions")
df_orders.printSchema()

msg.data:
pushdown_query: String = (SELECT count(t.order_id) orders, SUM(t.price), SUM(t.discounted_price) Amount, t.customer_id,  c.customer_nm, c.sex, c.age, ms.ms_type FROM transactions as t INNER JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id INNER JOIN maritalstatuses ms ON ms.ms_id = c.ms_id GROUP BY  t.customer_id, c.customer_nm, c.sex, c.age, ms.ms_type ORDER BY orders desc) as t
df_orders: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [orders: bigint, SUM(t.price): decimal(29,2) ... 6 more fields]

 |-- customer_nm: string (nullable = false)
 |-- sex: string (nullable = false)
 |-- age: integer (nullable = false)
 |-- ms_type: string (nullable = false)

paragraphs.title: Order Distribution by Age
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT age,sum(orders) as Orders, AVG(amount) as `Car Amount` FROM transactions group by age

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Orders Distribution by Sex
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT SUM(orders) as Orders, sexname(sex) FROM transactions group by sexName(sex)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Top Buyers Distribution by Sex
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT max(orders) as Orders, customer_nm, sexname(sex), age, ms_type  FROM transactions group by customer_nm, sexname(sex), age, ms_type order by Orders desc limit 10
